channel.title: CVE Feed for HT Plugins -- WP Education
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HT Plugins -- WP Education

item.title: CVE-2024-49630|2024-10-20T13:35:18.047Z -- ht%20plugins -- wp%20education
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HT Plugins WP Education allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Education: from n/a through 1.2.8.
